title: 2 DCs half the game still counts as a loss
body: great matchmaking system blizzard, gg another season denied my rightful place in challengeder

replies.body:
> denied my rightful place in challengeder

ahahahahahaha.
Oh wait, you're serious. Let me laugh even harder.
AHAHAHAHAHAHA!

yes, because matchmaking can totally predict who is going to dc. Some people just aren't able to get a stable connection to the riot server from their location, others can. In this case it isn't a server wide issue so you don't have loss prevented. 

GG no challenger for you ♥
You have 2 DCs in your game. Did your Nexus explode? Yes? Well your team lost :P

And you complain when enemies get 2 DC's as well?

While their server isn't really the best thing ever since disconnections do happen here and there in a somewhat frequent basis, still, you get some dc and the enemy team gets its share of it too.

So yes, it's a legit complaint on the SERVER in asking for a more stable connection when the game is this big, free to play and very team based. But it's got nothing to do with matchmaking in general.
